video.title: Gunslinger Girl -Il Teatrino-
video.synopsis: Outfitted with cybernetic implants, orphaned girls are transformed into a squad of ruthless killers trained to take down terrorists.

episodes.synopsis: Their beautiful, sunny day interrupted, Triela, Henrietta and Rico team up to capture the terrorists responsible for a bombing attack.
episodes.title: Distance Between Two: Brother and Sister

episodes.synopsis: Pinocchio was an ordinary boy like everyone else, until cruel circumstances turned him into something hideous and he's now the target of the SWA.
episodes.title: Pinocchio

episodes.synopsis: An investigator disappears while tracking down Pinocchio, and Triela and Hilshire are sent to find him. Meanwhile, two assassins come face to face.
episodes.title: Simulacra

episodes.synopsis: Angelica returns to the agency, but something about her doesn't seem right, and Marco must get her under control before she endangers the team.
episodes.title: Angelica's Return

episodes.synopsis: Priscilla remembers the good times before Marco was sent off to the agency. Angelica continues to readjust after her return from the hospital.
episodes.title: Evanescence and Remininscence

episodes.synopsis: Henrietta and Rico fight over a broken kaleidoscope but must put their argument aside and try to stop an FRF assassination attempt.
episodes.title: Retirement of the Tibetan Terrier

episodes.synopsis: In the middle of an intense interrogation of a terrorist suspect, the deadly Pinocchio makes a surprise -- and bloody -- visit.
episodes.title: Caterina and the Circle of Revenge

episodes.synopsis: While everyone else is training for missions, Claes is left by herself to wander the grounds and try to find ways to pass the time.
episodes.title: A Day in the Life of Claes

episodes.synopsis: Jose can't explain his sudden feelings of alienation toward Henrietta, who grows more and more devoted to him each day.
episodes.title: Clever Snake, Simple Pigeon

episodes.synopsis: In a look back at the lives the girls led before they were selected to be in the agency, Triela's story may be the most disturbing of them all.
episodes.title: Flowers of Good Will

episodes.synopsis: The Social Welfare Agency is one step ahead of Franco, who decides on a course of action to protect Cristiano.
episodes.title: Budding Feelings

episodes.synopsis: Cristiano begins losing control of his evil organization. Meanwhile, the deadly Pinocchio once again confronts agency assassin Triela.
episodes.title: The Fighting Puppet

episodes.synopsis: It's the final showdown between Pinocchio and Triela, two deadly assassins who realize that only one of them will walk away from their confrontation.
episodes.title: And So Pinocchio Becomes Human

episodes.synopsis: Marco and Angelica take down a Five Republics safe house while Rico and Jean travel to Venice to deal with a local Mafioso in bed with terrorists.
episodes.title: The Light of Venice, the Darkness of the Heart

episodes.synopsis: Rico and Henrietta meet up with their handlers at a Sicilian beach house for a rare vacation. Jean is startled by a ghostly vision.
episodes.title: Fantasma
